mapper.insert: insert into scientificResearch_publishPaper (classTeacher, status, name, journals, publicationDate, level, collectionInformation, character, type, note, year, semester) values (#{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{journals,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{publicationDate,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{collectionInformation,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{character,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{semester,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update scientificResearch_publishPaper set classTeacher = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, journals = #{journals,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, publicationDate = #{publicationDate,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, collectionInformation = #{collectionInformation,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, character = #{character,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, semester = #{semester,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, classTeacher, status, name, journals, publicationDate, level, collectionInformation, character, type, note, year, semester from scientificResearch_publishPaper where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
